item.title: Projects
item.description: Projects Here is a list of my private projects. All sources are hosted on github. Finance & Trading howtolosemoneyfast - Lottery simulator: Play Lotto, Lose Money, Repeat. It’s Science! howtolosemoneyfast_web - Website for the lottery simulator optimizer-weekly - Weekly portfolio optimization tool run_strategies - Trading strategy execution framework gotrader - Alpaca trading bot written in Go DevOps & Infrastructure docker-aws-cdk-v2 - Up-to-date Docker image for AWS CDK v2 with Python packages docker-aws-cdk - Docker image for AWS CDK with Python packages lego-scp-solver - Custom ACME challenge solvers for Let’s Encrypt Utilities & Tools buchhaltung - PDF invoice renamer based on content and rules rns510-code-finder - VW RNS510 stereo code calculator StayAlive - Mouse movement simulator to keep PC active pyeasysocket - Simplified Python TCP/UDP socket library pyjdpu - Jenkins Docker plugin updater CAD & Modeling gartenhaus - CadQuery 3D model for garden house construction Web & Documentation blog - Personal Hugo blog slashgordon.
